name: OakterSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, change channel to ESPN”
”Alexa, set temperature to 24 on AC”
”Alexa, turn off lamp”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Voice control your home appliances using Oakter skill for Amazon Alexa. The skill will work with OakRemote (IR Blaster), 6amp smart-plug, 16amp smart-plug, 25amp smart-box and Quadra smart-box. It can be used to voice control TV, Set-top Box, Lights, Fan, Coffee Machine, AC, Heater, Mosquito Repellent, Lamp etc. 
Please use the Oakter Smart Home app (iOS or Android) to configure your Oakter devices to your home WiFi network and give them distinct names. 

The steps to enable Oakter Smart Home skill are- 

1. Click on Smart Home section from the Alexa Companion App. 
2. Under Configure Smart home, click on “Smart Home skills”
3. Click on “Smart Home Skill” / “Enable skills” / “Alexa Smart Home Store”
4. Search for Oakter skill and click on enable
5. Use your Oakter Smart Home mobile app login details to link the account

Oakter Smart Home devices that are compatible with this skill are: 

1. OakRemote (IR Blaster) : Voice control all your remote controlled devices like TV, AC, Set-Top Box, music system etc. It acts as a WiFi Universal Remote for Infrared remotes. For ACs, Change AC Mode is not supported command.
2. WiFi Smart Home Hub : Provides WiFi connectivity to Oakter Smart Home devices listed below
3. 6Amp Smart-Plug : Smartens one low powered plugged in appliance like lamp, coffee machine etc. Works with Oakter Smart Home WiFi Hub. 
4. 16Amp Smart-Plug : Smartens one high powered plugged in appliance like geyser, motor etc. Works with Oakter Smart Home WiFi Hub. 
5. 25Amp Smart-Box : Smartens one switch with load up to 5.5KW. Works with Oakter Smart Home WiFi Hub.
6. Quadra Smart-Box : Smartens up to four switches with each load up to 1.5 KW. Works with Oakter Smart Home WiFi Hub.

OakRemote, 6amp Smart-Plug and 16Amp Smart-Plug do not require any expert installation. You can simply plug in these devices to enable voice control using Alexa. It is suggested to call an electrician to install 25amp smart-box and Quadra smart-box. 

Things to Note: 
1. The physical switches work normally with Oakter Smart-Boxes. 
2. Only one Oakter smart home hub is required in a typical home. 
3. Discover your devices by saying, “Alexa, discover my devices” or running a device discovery in the Smart Home screen of the Alexa app.
4. Create group of Smart Home devices in the Alexa app to control them together. 
5. Smarten appliances in multiple premises (like home, office, shop etc.) using same Oakter login. Link Oakter login to your Amazon Alexa login to seamlessly control your home and office appliances using the same amazon account for all your Echo devices, even in different premises.
